statements: DELETE FROM EmailCampaignData WHERE campaign_date < '2022-01-01' AND open_rate > 0.2;
DELETE FROM campaign_responses WHERE response_type = 'positive' AND response_date > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id IN (SELECT campaign_id FROM campaign_responses WHERE response_type = 'positive' AND response_date > '2021-01-01');
DELETE FROM email_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 101 AND total_recipients < 5000;
DELETE FROM campaign_results WHERE result_id = 201 AND total_responses < 100;
DELETE FROM email_engagement WHERE engagement_type = 'click' AND engagement_date < '2022-01-01';
